long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet Assistant - make google meet experience better.

Features:
- Dynamic extension icon: browser icon updates indicating current microphone and camera state(on/off)
- Global shortcuts: without having to switch to browser tabs.
  - Toggle microphone
  - Toggle camera
- Custom settings: set initial preferences.
  - Keep microphone off/on default
  - Keep camera off/on default
- Enable AutoJoin
- Set AutoJoinDelay(seconds) - automatically join meeting after specified time
